Entries.Tue: It's nice staying in the jungle when the sun gets really bright.#$e#The sun can't find us beneath the leaves. We'll trick it! Haha...$h

Entries.birthdayLoveA: Oh! @, that's my favorite, thank you! I'm so glad you remembered my birthday.$1
Entries.birthdayLoveB: This is great! It's going right in my nest. Thanks for remembering my birthday!$1
Entries.birthdayLikeA: Mmm... cute! Thanks for the birthday gift, friend.$1
Entries.birthdayLikeB: Ooh, pretty! Thanks for the birthday gift.$1
Entries.birthdayNeutralA: That's a nice present... I'm glad I'm your friend.
Entries.engageA: This is a marriage proposal, isn't it...? But, you're already engaged...$s
Entries.marriedA: Very pretty... I think %spouse would like that!
Entries.marriedB: Go on, give it to your betrothed! Isn't that what you're supposed to do?
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: A mermaid shell? Right, Miss Penny said that this is for when you want to marry... uhh...$s
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: ...How about you ask me again in a few years? I'm only {{LeoAge}}...$s
Entries.rejectNPCA: Ooh, those are pretty! Miss Penny told me that in the Valley, this is a common gift to show affection. Thanks for showing me this!$h
Entries.rejectNPCB: You should give those to someone you want to date. No need to be nervous!$h
